title: Japanese Hot Pot Party
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>I’ve gotten into making Japanese hot pot recently~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Oh, that’s good to hear, Emma-san. What’s your favorite kind of hot pot?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hmmmm...... Seafood hot pot is tasty. Tofu hot pot and tomato hot pot are pretty good too. I like curry hot pot as well...... Hmm.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, there are so many kinds of delicious hot pot that it’s almost overwhelming.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah. It would be great to eat all of them at once~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Then why don’t we have a hot pot party? We can all share.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Wait, that’s a great idea! Let’s have a hot pot party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Why don’t you send out a message asking if they’d like to have one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Alright! Let’s see, “Hot Pot Party Announcement”...... Look! They’re already saying they’ll come...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>It looks like it’ll be a very lively hot pot party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
